oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mid-Day Merry-Go-Round - 18th Anniversary clip [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part of WNOX's 18th anniversary celebration of program Mid-Day Merry-Go-Round, featuring Reverend Franklin and announcer Lowell Blanchard (unconfirmed). Start and end of disc not transferred due to significant missing lacquer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Reverend Franklin gives a sermon [incomplete, start missing] -- Lowell Blanchard thanks Reverend Franklin (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WNOX (Radio station : Knoxville, Tenn.); Mid-day merry-go-round (Radio program); Blanchard, Lowell, 1910-1968
